languages.text: Отряд высадился рядом с подозрительной пещерой. Вход в нее оказался перегорожен массивной пласталевой дверью, некогда пробитой мельта-зарядом и затем кое-как залатанной. Получив сигнал от верного кибермастифа, проктор Антар предупредил блюстителей о засаде впереди, и нападение не заставило себя ждать — истощенные люди атаковали их без предупреждения из темноты.

The squad landed near a suspicious cave. The entrance to the cave was blocked by a massive plasteel door that had previously been pierced by a melta charge and then shoddily patched up. After receiving a signal from his faithful cyber-mastiff, Proctor Anthar warned the enforcers of the ambush ahead, and the attack was not long in coming — armed people with emaciated bodies charged out of the darkness.
languages.original_text: Отряд высадился рядом с подозрительной пещерой. Вход в нее оказался перегорожен массивной пласталевой дверью, некогда пробитой мельта-зарядом и затем кое-как залатанной. Получив сигнал от верного кибермастифа, проктор Антар предупредил блюстителей о засаде впереди, и нападение не заставило себя ждать — истощенные люди атаковали их без предупреждения из темноты.

traits.locale_text: The squad landed near a suspicious cave. The entrance to the cave was blocked by a massive plasteel door that had previously been pierced by a melta charge and then patched up. After receiving a signal from his faithful cyber-mastiff, Proctor Anthar warned the enforcers of the ambush ahead, and the attack was not long in coming — the exhausted people attacked without warning out of the darkness.

The squad landed near a suspicious cave. The entrance to the cave was blocked by a massive plasteel door that had previously been pierced by a melta charge and then patched up. After receiving a signal from his faithful cyber-mastiff, Proctor Anthar warned the enforcers of the ambush ahead, and the attack was not long in coming — the exhausted people attacked without warning out of the darkness.

After receiving a signal from his faithful cyber-mastiff, Proctor Anthar warned the enforcers of the ambush ahead, and the attack was not long in coming — armed people with emaciated bodies charged out of the darkness.

The squad landed near a suspicious cave. The entrance to the cave was blocked by a massive plasteel door that had previously been pierced by a melta charge and then shoddily patched up. After receiving a signal from his faithful cyber-mastiff, Proctor Anthar warned the enforcers of the ambush ahead, and the attack was not long in coming — armed people with emaciated bodies charged out of the darkness.

languages.text: Der Trupp landete in der Nähe einer verdächtigen Höhle. Der Eingang war von einer riesigen Tür aus Plaststahl versperrt, die einmal von einer Melterladung durchschlagen und dann unsachgemäß repariert worden war. Nachdem er ein Signal von seinem treuen Cyber-Mastiff erhalten hatte, warnte Proktor Anthar die Enforcer vor dem bevorstehenden Hinterhalt, der kurz darauf auch erfolgte – bewaffnete, aber abgemagerte Leute attackierten aus der Dunkelheit heraus.
languages.original_text: The squad landed near a suspicious cave. The entrance to the cave was blocked by a massive plasteel door that had previously been pierced by a melta charge and then shoddily patched up. After receiving a signal from his faithful cyber-mastiff, Proctor Anthar warned the enforcers of the ambush ahead, and the attack was not long in coming — armed people with emaciated bodies charged out of the darkness.

traits.locale_text: Der Trupp landete in der Nähe einer verdächtigen Höhle. Der Eingang war von einer riesigen Tür aus Plaststahl versperrt, die einmal von einer Melterladung durchschlagen und dann unsachgemäß repariert worden war. Nachdem er ein Signal von seinem treuen Cyber-Mastiff erhalten hatte, warnte Proktor Anthar die Enforcer vor dem bevorstehenden Hinterhalt, der kurz darauf auch erfolgte – bewaffnete, aber abgemagerte Leute attackierten aus der Dunkelheit heraus.

languages.text: L'escouade a atterri près d'une grotte suspecte, dont l'accès était bloqué par une grande porte en plastacier, endommagée par une charge à fusion puis rafistolée. Après avoir reçu un signal de la part de son fidèle cyber-mastiff, le proctor Anthar a averti les prévôts d'une embuscade imminente. En effet, des hommes armés mais émaciés ont tenté de lancer une attaque en tirant profit de l'obscurité.
languages.original_text: The squad landed near a suspicious cave. The entrance to the cave was blocked by a massive plasteel door that had previously been pierced by a melta charge and then shoddily patched up. After receiving a signal from his faithful cyber-mastiff, Proctor Anthar warned the enforcers of the ambush ahead, and the attack was not long in coming — armed people with emaciated bodies charged out of the darkness.

traits.locale_text: L'escouade a atterri près d'une grotte suspecte, dont l'accès était bloqué par une grande porte en plastacier, endommagée par une charge à fusion puis rafistolée. Après avoir reçu un signal de la part de son fidèle cyber-mastiff, le proctor Anthar a averti les prévôts d'une embuscade imminente. En effet, des hommes armés mais émaciés ont tenté de lancer une attaque en tirant profit de l'obscurité.

languages.text: 小队在某个可疑的洞窟附近着陆。洞窟入口被一扇巨大的塑钢门挡住了，它曾被热熔炸弹炸穿，但后来又被匆匆修补起来。安萨监察官从他忠诚的生化獒犬那里收到了信号，警告执法者前方有埋伏。在那之后不久，小队便遭到了攻击：一群骨瘦如柴、全副武装的敌人从黑暗之中冲了出来。
languages.original_text: The squad landed near a suspicious cave. The entrance to the cave was blocked by a massive plasteel door that had previously been pierced by a melta charge and then shoddily patched up. After receiving a signal from his faithful cyber-mastiff, Proctor Anthar warned the enforcers of the ambush ahead, and the attack was not long in coming — armed people with emaciated bodies charged out of the darkness.

traits.locale_text: 小队在某个可疑的洞窟附近着陆。洞窟入口被一扇巨大的塑钢门挡住了，它曾被热熔炸弹炸穿，但后来又被匆匆修补起来。安萨监察官从他忠诚的生化獒犬那里收到了信号，警告执法者前方有埋伏。在那之后不久，小队便遭到了攻击：一群骨瘦如柴、全副武装的敌人从黑暗之中冲了出来。
小队在某个可疑的洞窟附近着陆。洞窟入口被一扇巨大的塑钢门挡住了，它曾被热熔炸弹炸穿，但后来又被修补好了。安萨监察官从他忠诚的生化獒犬那里收到了信号，警告执法者前方有埋伏。在那之后不久，小队便遭到了攻击：一群疲惫不堪的敌人从黑暗之中出现，毫无征兆地发起了攻击。

languages.text: La unidad aterrizó cerca de una cueva sospechosa. La entrada estaba bloqueada por una enorme puerta de plastiacero que ya había sido forzada con una carga de fusión y posteriormente remendada. Tras recibir una señal de su fiel cibermastín, el Procurador Anthar informó al personal de seguridad de la emboscada que les esperaba. No tardó en producirse. Varias personas demacradas y armadas cargaron contra nuestras fuerzas desde las sombras.
languages.original_text: The squad landed near a suspicious cave. The entrance to the cave was blocked by a massive plasteel door that had previously been pierced by a melta charge and then shoddily patched up. After receiving a signal from his faithful cyber-mastiff, Proctor Anthar warned the enforcers of the ambush ahead, and the attack was not long in coming — armed people with emaciated bodies charged out of the darkness.

traits.locale_text: La unidad aterrizó cerca de una cueva sospechosa. La entrada estaba bloqueada por una enorme puerta de plastiacero que ya había sido forzada con una carga de fusión y posteriormente remendada. Tras recibir una señal de su fiel cibermastín, el Procurador Anthar informó al personal de seguridad de la emboscada que les esperaba. No tardó en producirse. Varias personas demacradas y armadas cargaron contra nuestras fuerzas desde las sombras.

languages.text: 部隊は怪しい洞窟の近くに着陸した。洞窟の入り口は巨大なプラスチール製の扉で塞がれており、以前にメルタ爆薬で穴を開けられ、その後雑に修繕されていた。忠実なサイバーマスチフからの合図を受けたアンサール代理人は、待ち伏せの警告を執行官たちに発し、間もなく攻撃が始まった。やせ細った体の武装した人々が闇の中から突進してきた。
languages.original_text: The squad landed near a suspicious cave. The entrance to the cave was blocked by a massive plasteel door that had previously been pierced by a melta charge and then shoddily patched up. After receiving a signal from his faithful cyber-mastiff, Proctor Anthar warned the enforcers of the ambush ahead, and the attack was not long in coming — armed people with emaciated bodies charged out of the darkness.

traits.locale_text: 部隊は怪しい洞窟の近くに着陸した。洞窟の入り口は巨大なプラスチール製の扉で塞がれており、以前にメルタ爆薬で穴を開けられ、その後雑に修繕されていた。忠実なサイバーマスチフからの合図を受けたアンサール代理人は、待ち伏せの警告を執行官たちに発し、間もなく攻撃が始まった。やせ細った体の武装した人々が闇の中から突進してきた。
部隊は怪しい洞窟の近くに着陸した。洞窟の入り口は巨大なプラスチール製の扉で塞がれており、以前にメルタ爆薬で穴を開けられ、その後修繕されていた。忠実なサイバーマスチフからの合図を受けたアンサール代理人は、待ち伏せの警告を執行官たちに発し、間もなく攻撃が始まった。疲弊した人々が闇の中から不意に襲いかかってきた。

languages.text: Manga, şüpheli bir mağaranın yakınına iniş yapıyor. Mağara girişinde daha önce melta bombasıyla delinip tamir edilmiş devasa bir plasçelik kapı bulunuyor. Sadık siber mastifinden gelen sinyal üzerine Üsteğmen Anthar, infazcılarını ilerideki pusu konusunda uyarıyor. Saldırı gecikmiyor, bir deri bir kemik kalmış bitkin insanlar, karanlığın içinden ansızın atılıp hücuma geçiyor.
languages.original_text: The squad landed near a suspicious cave. The entrance to the cave was blocked by a massive plasteel door that had previously been pierced by a melta charge and then shoddily patched up. After receiving a signal from his faithful cyber-mastiff, Proctor Anthar warned the enforcers of the ambush ahead, and the attack was not long in coming — armed people with emaciated bodies charged out of the darkness.

traits.locale_text: Manga, şüpheli bir mağaranın yakınına iniş yapıyor. Mağara girişinde daha önce melta bombasıyla delinip tamir edilmiş devasa bir plasçelik kapı bulunuyor. Sadık siber mastifinden gelen sinyal üzerine Üsteğmen Anthar, infazcılarını ilerideki pusu konusunda uyarıyor. Saldırı gecikmez, bir deri bir kemik kalmış bitkin insanlar, karanlığın içinden ansızın atılıp hücuma geçiyor.

Manga, şüpheli bir mağaranın yakınına iniş yapar. Mağara girişinde daha önce melta bombasıyla delinip tamir edilmiş devasa bir plasçelik kapı bulunur. Sadık siber mastifinden gelen sinyal üzerine Üsteğmen Anthar, infazcılarını ilerideki pusu konusunda uyarır. Saldırı gecikmez, bitkin insanlar karanlığın içinden ansızın atılıp hücuma geçer.
